We are Boxne, LLC was originally known as Hosting42. Hosting42.net was established by our Chief Executive Officer on March 14, 2010. The name was later changed to Boxne, LLC December 17, 2014. Boxne, LLC continues to operate with the customers in mind. We provide excellent service, 24x7x365 Technical Support, Discounted Billing for Annual Customers as well as discounted services for long term customers.

45-DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE
